sentences.en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river - racy speed boat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往 - --高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Busy boasts chugscurry about the river - speed boat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往 --- 高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Eliza got up and marched out of the room, with a stolid face.
sentences.cn: 意莱莎站起身,大步走出去, 面无表情.

sentences.en: He conceals his feelings behind a rather stolid manner.
sentences.cn: 他装作无动于衷的样子以掩盖自己的感情.

sentences.en: He glanced furtively at the stolid faces of the two detectives.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷地瞄了一下两名侦探面无表情的脸孔。

sentences.en: He has a stolid make - up.
Her face showed nothing but stolid indifference.
sentences.cn: 她的脸上毫无表情,只有麻木的无动于衷.

sentences.en: People who expressed themselves roughly called her stolid.
sentences.cn: 出言粗鲁的人称她感情麻木.

sentences.en: She felt more sympathy for Neil's sombrely stolid manner than she ever had before.
sentences.cn: 她比过去更同情尼尔忧郁而执拗的举止了。

sentences.en: Sobakevitch was as stolid as ever.
sentences.cn: 索巴凯维奇依旧不动声色.

sentences.en: The captain remained stolid and determined.
sentences.cn: 上尉坚定不移地站在那里.

sentences.en: The poor creature dropped on his knees before the stolid murderer, and clasped his appealing hands.
sentences.cn: 这可怜的家伙在这狠心的凶手面前跪下来, 合着手央求他.
她们仍旧倔强冷静,坐着不动.
他们竟然是如此麻木不仁.

sentences.en: Verbs are action words, much nicer than stolid, immovable nouns.
sentences.cn: 动词是行为词汇, 比固定的 、 稳固的名词要好多了.

words.tran_cn: 迟钝的；缺乏热情的；冷漠的

trans.tran_cn: <贬>不动感情的，不关心的，淡漠的，无动于衷的
trans.tran_en: someone who is stolid does not react to situations or seem excited by them when most people would react – used to show disapproval
